Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: புணர்ச்சி பழகுதல் வேண்டா உணர்ச்சிதான் நட்பாங் கிழமை தரும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Living together and holding frequent intercourse are not necessary (for friendship); (mutual) understanding can alone create a claim for it.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: Two individuals are shown standing far apart, on two separate mountain peaks. They have never met or spent time together ('புணர்ச்சி பழகுதல் வேண்டா').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Despite the physical distance, a powerful, radiant bridge of pure light connects their minds/hearts. This bridge represents their shared feeling and mutual understanding ('உணர்ச்சி').
Layered_Composition.Background: This bridge of understanding is shown to be the true foundation of their powerful friendship ('நட்பாங் கிழமை'), far stronger than any bond forged by mere physical proximity.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Friendship is not created by physical closeness or long association, but by a deep, mutual understanding and similarity of feeling.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The bridge of light connecting two distant people is the central metaphor. It powerfully visualizes a bond based on understanding rather than physical contact.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Connected, empathetic, profound, beyond the physical.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A beautiful, ethereal light. The bridge of understanding glows with a brilliant, pure light, connecting the two figures across the vast distance.

Technical_Cues.Camera: An epic, ultra-wide landscape shot that emphasizes the great distance between the two figures and the magical bridge that connects them.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The bridge of light is the primary source of illumination.

Cultural_Anchors: Friendship from understanding, not proximity ('உணர்ச்சிதான் நட்பாங் கிழமை தரும்')
Meeting and habit are not necessary.

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: broken bridge, people standing close but disconnected, text artifacts, cartoonish.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the bridge of light.
